activities: We use information to provide product and service recommendations and advertisements on our customer and other third party websites or through customer emails.  In the future we may decide to use information to provide such recommendations and advertisements through other forms of digital distribution.  We use information submitted by visitors to our website to maintain customer and potential customer contact information.
